string.text: Dead Scientists' documents
Judging from these records, the Scientists were transporting a very unusual artefact...
Krysjuk's PDA
Krysjuk kept valuable information in his PDA. Borov wants it back...
Borov's stash
Borov said that there'll be something to gain from this...
Counterfeit vodka
Vodka
There once was a trader in this area trying to sell off cheap vodka. The locals made him drink it... Now he sells it to down and out spirits...
Radioactive bread
'Bread'
Once a normal loaf of bread, but now just a radioactive piece of shit... If you're sick of living, go ahead and eat it...
Krysjuk's stash
Krysjuk's stash full of loot...
Hello, my friend... want to have a chat?
Sure. Do you have anything to drink?
Very well, let's take a seat and finish a bottle
Well, let's quench our thirst!
Sounds good to me!...
What a shame...we finished off the bottle already...
That went down smooth... thanks for the drink... I'm getting a good buzz...
Have you heard about any good loot?
I will tell you, friend...Recently I found a PDA on a corpse, there was info on it about hidden loot. I'm in no shape to go look for it, you can have it...
Well, how interesting can it be?... this isn't exactly the French Riviera, in case you haven't noticed...
Thanks for the tip...
Maybe you will hear something later...
How's life treating you? Want to chat?
Sure, I've got nothing better to do at the moment...
Out here... there's nothing better to do...
Let's share a bottle, and exchange stories then...
Come on then, let's get to it then...
I would if I had any...
Let's have one for the boys...
So comrade, have you heard about any swag?
I did overhear some talk about a cache... It's too far away to interest me, you can check it out if you like...
Nothing recently, check back with me another time...
I'll check it out if I go there...
Another time then...
Hello, soldier of fortune!
Greetings, Stalker. Borov has ordered us not to mess with you, but don't try anything stupid...
No need to be so serious. When's the last time you drank some real vodka?
Too damn long, pour me a glass and I'll be grateful...
Thats the spirit, lets drink as brothers!
Damn, I thought I had a bottle...
Mmmm, that really hit the spot! You're alright, Stalker...
Any information from your prisoners? Any stash locations?

Yesterday, we took three Duty soldiers prisoner. Once we started to interogate them, one of them says, "Brothers, this is not necessary. I can show you where some loot is located!" We thought this was bullshit because he can't give an exact location, but he says he can take us there... He claimed it was close by, but we thought he was trying to lead us into an ambush. See what you think...
Nothing I can share with you!
Maybe it was just a story, but you never know...
Maybe next time you will be more generous to those that share their vodka...
Wow, I haven't seen you in ages... How have you been?
I got very drunk last night and things are still blurry, but I don't remember meeting you...
What you need is another drink to clear your mind...
Another swig always does the trick...
Let's drink to your health!
Damn! All I have is an empty bottle...
U-u-uh... my health is getting better with every drop...
Now that you're feeling better, is there any hiding places you know about?

Don't speak so loudly, I watched Borov execute six men he suspected of stealing from him... I know of a stash, but I dont dare take it. If you get caught...I dont know you. Stop by later and I might have something else
All Borov's caches have been found or moved. He doesn't trust anybody...
I won't rat you out!
That's okay, I have to go now...
Greetings, brother... How is it going for you?
This place is not what I expected... Does it ever get easier?
Yes and no. Let's talk over a drink. You'll feel better...
A drink is just what I need...
Well here's to the Zone...
Poured himself a man...
Strong... Cures all that ails me... My worries are fading...
Do you have you any leads on hidden loot? I don't mind travelling...

Recently, Wolf pulled a stalker out of an anomaly, not much of him remained... But... in his backpack was a note with coordinates. It appears he had hidden loot there... But Wolf told me I'm not experienced enough to go there. Here's the coordinates - write them down...
No, I just came here recently and have not ventured very deep into the zone... Come back in a week. Maybe by then I will have something to share...
Thanks for the tip... I will have a look...
That is fine, we will talk again later...
Hello, how is life treating you?
Hello... So-so. It could be better...
Would a stiff drink put a smile on that face?...
It sure would! My luck has already changed for the better...
Let's drink to bravery and good fortune!...
Shit, I'll have to get more vodka from Sid...
Yes, to bravery! and to the fallen... May our fortunes rise together!
Speaking of good fortune... Do you have any information to share?

Recently a pair of stalkers came to see Sid... I was sleeping right outside Sid's door at the time. Well, I was not actually sleeping, I could hear what was going on... They wanted to buy some equipment on credit, claiming they knew of a rich cache and that payment would be made when they retreived the goods. They even described the place where it was hidden... But Sid would not give them anything. I thought I would go get it myself, but I dont have all the necessary gear... Here is the place...If you find a lot of loot - don't forget about me...
Nothing to tell really. Good fortune is a campfire and a hot meal...
If it's a good stash, I'll not forget you...
Maybe you will hear something later...
Why so gloomy? Do you need any help?
Is this place supposed to be fun? I'm having a bad day...
Well let's change the mood, a drink will help...
Aha, that's more like it! This will certainly help...
So... let's drink to... to HOPE!
Shit! NO! I remember I had a bottle! And now it's gone!
Thanks for making my day. It's good to know there are people like you in the Zone...
Now that we're relaxed - do you know if there's any loot hidden nearby? Have you heard anything?
Yes, I have heard something, but it's far from here... Several have gone to find the loot, but none have returned. I will show you on the map - here...
No, I've not heard anything... I don't listen in to others' private conversations...
I won't go out of my way for it, but if I'm nearby - I'll take a look...
Well, the old saying is true. The less you know - the better you sleep...
Hello, my friend... How's your day?
Hello... I've not slept good for about a week. I've been having nightmares ever since my friend Vayazma got killed by boars...
It sounds like you need a good dose of vodka for your nerves...
That would help. Do you have any?
Of course I do... Lets drink to Vayazma!
I forgot to bring any with me... I'll come back later...
That's just what I needed! I'm already feeling better... I've got a real buzz!
Standard doctor's medicine... So, have you heard of any hiding places in the zone?

The day before yesterday with some soldiers I shared a couple of bottles with. They usually stay in the Agroprom, but quite often run over here as Sid supplies them with their vodka... So, they told me that they have caught a zombified stalker! The commander ordered to take the creature alive, so they can sell it to some eggheads in the Great Land for experiments. If it was me, a bullet in a temple of it's head would have been better....Well, on this zombie's right hand was some sort of tattoo...but not a normal one, it was like someone cut a drawing into his flesh...a drawing of a map...
I've heard talk of anomalies, and monsters, but nothing about loot. Everybody is keeping their secrets to themselves. Stop by another time and maybe I'll have something for you...
Yes, damn, it is better to... No pain...
I will return, then we'll talk...
Hello, brother... How are things going here?
Another long day of keeping mutants at bay... I'd rather have another assignment...
Maybe a drink will help?... Or is that against orders?
Not supposed to drink on watch... But to hell with that, it's impossible to go without vodka in the Zone. So pour the good stuff...
Well! Here's to good friends!
I would pour you more, but my last half-litre should be saved for bringing down radiation...
That makes things better! Have a snack, here's some sausage...
Thanks. What have you heard here? Can you share some news?

No special news. But, have you heard about Max Lubero? He was caught by bandits in the dark valley... Bullet - a friend of Lubero, went to find out what happened... Before he left, he told me about a map Max had on him on which was the location of a cache... He wanted me to go and get the loot before the bandits found it, but Prapor wont let anymore men leave the post. We are already short two fighters here on this post... So you can have this information, I hope you find it before the bandits...
I've not heard anything special...
Thanks for the tip, I will try to find it first...
Well, if you hear anything, remember me. I will check with you again...
Hello, comrade!
What are you up to?
I'm just in a good mood... Would like to share my happiness with a drink?
That would put me in a good mood also! A double should do the trick...
I'm glad to meet a real drinker, down the hatch!
I need to pick up another bottle, and then I will return...
Ha, I can outdrink the whole unit... I have a high tolerance for the nectar of the gods...
You must hear a lot of stories around the campfire... So tell me... Has anyone spoken about some hidden loot?...

A few days ago the Stalker 'Bes' stayed here, a good fellow. I shared a bottle with the loner... He was short on ammo, so I shared some of mine with him... He didnt have anything of value to trade, so he told me about a cache he found. He said it contained no loot. But judging by the signs, someone frequently hides their valuables there. If you feel like taking a look, heres the location...
I've been getting so drunk at night that I dont remember what anyone was talking about. Come back some other time, I might remember something...
Thank you. I may well explore this area...
You should cut down on your drinking, too much of a good thing makes a strong man weak...
Greetings comrade, you look familiar, have we met before?
I don't know... I only remember people I drink with...
Well let's drink to our friendship...
Well, I think I do remember you... pour it out!
Here... we drink for... for friendship!
Shit! NO! I thought I had a bottle. But now it's gone!
For reliable friends! Which even in the Zone you can't do without!
Hey, I was wondering - is it possible to find any loot nearby? Have you heard anything?

I've not told anybody about this, but since you are a friend I will tell. I do know about one stash... I overheard some talk... It might be nothing, or it might be real. If you are a true friend I will share this information
No, I did not hear anything... I have already collected all the loot around here. If there's anything left - well, only Strelok knows...
About what conversation! Really? Not much from a so-called friend...
Strelok? Well, well... I will have to ask him...
Greetings, do you have time to talk?
Sit down... What is it you want to talk about?...
I thought we could share a bottle and maybe information?
I'm never one to turn down a drink! Pour it out, what are you waiting for?
I'm filling the glasses right to the rim - I like a big shot...
I've got to fetch another bottle...
A good burn going down... Oooh! That will warm the bones...
It must get boring staying for days on end here?

Yes, it's the same shit everyday. The barman supplies us with food as payment for our protection... We sometimes let loners pass, that is if they have some data to share... Sometimes we get called for some real action...\nJust the other day, a wounded stalker came running into the post. A pair of burers were right on his tail... We welcomed the burers with some grenades and they were quickly put down... Then the shivering Stalker sat at our fire and promised us all a lot of money if we would go collect his loot from a cache he marked on the map... An odd fellow, really... Nobody here is going to risk their lives for this bum. We protect the barrier! We defend the people from evil spirits... If you're interested - here is the location...
It certainly is boring, but I have a job to do - the world needs protection from the evil here!
Yes, I will check it out...
Well then, I will not distract the hero any longer...
Greetings, comrade... How are you?
Bandit activity has increased! My nerves are constantly on edge!
You need to let off some steam... A stiff drink will help you relax...
It's been a long time since I went on a good binge... Let's drink, while things remain calm...
Let's drink to a better tomorrow!
My bottle is empty, sorry about that - I will have to restock...
Drink! If you want to die from old age!
Going down smooth... That takes away the tension... What have you heard?

All around here keep their thoughts to themselves... But I have heard about a pair of Stalkers who stashed some loot while on the run from the military... I was going to profit from this information myself, but I dont think I will be going there... So, if you want to check it out, go ahead...
Everyone around here keeps their thoughts to themselves... Even friends don't trust each other with their caches...
Yes. It's hard to to trust people...
Maybe later you will hear something interesting...
What were you shooting at?
We shoot to scare our enemies away...
Shall we drink to bravery?
Certainly... pour!
Here's a full glass! The good stuff!
I'm almost dry, I will check back with you later...
Phew! Tastes like diesel fuel, but it's strong...
Heh, what were you expecting... lemonade? So have you overheard any talk about loot?

I was in the Swamps with a group when we came across a ruined village... It looked like the devil had just had a party, corpses and body parts strewn all about... I searched one of the bodies and found a map with a mark on it about hidden loot... Here is the map, try to reach it if you can, I could not. We were attacked by snorks and had to leave the territory...
I've heard a lot of rumours, but nothing worth wasting your time on...
If I can find it, half is yours...
Alright, if you hear anything, please remember me...
Comrade, do you have time to talk?
It depends on what you want...
I'm not trying to sell you anything. I just hate to drink alone. Would you like to share a bottle with me?
Well then, I'm glad to meet you... Let's not waste any of that precious nectar...
Let's drink to our new friendship!
I'm sorry, it seems my bottle has gone missing...
You speak too much when you drink! A person should remain silent until something important or enlightening should be said...
Looks like I've met a philosopher. Well educate me, how should we live?...

Everyone's life is different, and to learn another's life is impossible... Have you heard of 'Lucky Levka'? Everyone praised him because he was lucky with women - they just loved him. In the zone, even mutants stayed away from him... But he loved to drink, and when he did he would not stop talking. He was blabbing away and walked right into a Fruit Punch anomaly... And where is he now? Not even a scrap of hair remains - all dissolved into jelly. I went through his backpack to find an address of a relative of his, but all I found was a map with a stash location... And I think there will be no happiness for me from that loot. So I prefer to pass on this information...
If there is one thing I've learned, there is no such thing as luck. A clean weapon and a backpack full of ammo will get me through the day. Thanks for the info...
It's necessary to care about what comes tomorrow, not just live for today...
Well, personally, I believe in destiny... I was meant to be here in the Zone. I'll speak with you later...
How are things going, my friend?
I'm feeling a little depressed about life today...
I've got something that will change your mood! Would you like some vodka?
I would love to have a drink, you really know how to cheer a guy up...
Let's drink to happier days! Pour away...
Oh, I thought I had a bottle, but I can't find it...
It's good, but it burns like a she-devil!
Have you heard of anything interesting?

I did hear a story, but I don't think it's true. I will tell you about it... Do you know a Stalker named Eureka? He recently stopped by and said he had just returned from a mission with some skilled stalkers... No telling how long he had been on his drinking binge, we could barely understand what he was saying... Our laughter made him mad, he was flashing his PDA in our faces so we could see his mark on the map to prove his story. Nobody believed him - just another snotty nosed rookie from the Cordon... What do you think?
I really can't share anything at the moment. Perhaps tomorrow I will have something to tell you...
I can see why you would not believe him... But I might take a look if I'm in that area...
Maybe tomorrow, my friend...
Greetings, how are things here with you?
Things are cheerful enough. If you're looking for cheer, you want go to the Bar. If you want to fight for money, then go to the arena. The Bar is almost in the Zone centre...
We should have a drink and share some conversation...
That's a good idea... Pour me one, then I can finish you off in the arena. Just a joke!
Drink, for the good spirit!
I think I left my bottle in my stash. I will get it and return... Wait here!
Well, let's drink...
What talk have you heard, anything interesting?

Yes, I hear a lot of talk...Like there is a story about a teleport directly to the Monolith. I doubt it. Also, there was a story about a new monster called a 'Deathclaw', but I've never seen one. Then I heard Duty and Freedom were planning to divide the Zone. I hear that one a lot, actually. But enough about stories...I was tracking down an artefact when I found a PDA in the bushes. In it were some coordinates of what I believe to be a cache. Here, you see... We can go check it out together...
Come in the evening to the Bar, we will gather, we will talk... A lot of useful gossip to hear, only do not forget to buy lots of drinks...
That's a long way, and I have another job to attend to...
Okay, I'll come...
Hello, comrade. How are you?
I've got a lot on my mind... Please stop bothering me...
You are in a bad mood... perhaps a drink might make you feel better?
That would make me feel better! Break out the bottle...
That's the spirit! Forget all your problems!
I have to go...
Nothing like a good drink to make the day better... Pour some vodka...
Let's wash away the gloom with good vodka, it works for me... Do you know the location of any caches?

The Zone has too many people who can't be trusted... You are different, you help when you can... I do know of a stash, but I don't have anyone to cover my back to go get it, so I had given up on retrieving it - but I'm sure it's still there... Do you think you could find it by yourself? Here's the location...
So many people putting on fronts here, it's impossible to trust anyone... I don't want to talk anymore...
I'll come back again. I will try, if possible, to restore your faith in people...
No, you're up to something. I'm leaving...
Greetings, brother, Have we met before?
I don't think so. What's your name?
They call me Marked One...
Nice to meet you, Marked One. Let's drink to our meeting. Do you have a bottle?
Of course I do! Here! The strong stuff, it will put you on the floor...
I'm all out, I had to trade all my stock for ammo...
Ha! You speak the truth! Strong! Well, the Zone has seen a new friendship created...
So tell me, is it possible to find any loot nearby. Did you hear anything?

Well, you're a good person it seems, and good people should help each other. I'll tell you about something that happened to me recently. You'll think I'm telling ghost stories, but it's true... Zombies constantly wander into this territory, even though all approaches are blocked by Duty. A moose shouldn't even be able to get through, but these Zombies still appear. Last night I was taking a rest from drinking, the barman would not take credit, so rest was my only option. I rolled out my sleeping bag in one of the empty hangers and went to sleep. I awake to a horrible smell, the stench of death. I opened my eyes and there is a Zombie standing right over me, I practically shit myself... I couldnt move, I was frozen with fright. The Zombie is mumbling these figures, over and over. I closed my eyes, and when I opened them again - there was nobody... Only the stench remained... And the figures were fresh on my mind, they are similar to coordinates. Only it's far from here. If you want them, here they are...
All the loot which was in easy places has already been found. You will need to go to the Zone's center - they say you can find a new artefact called a Klondike...
I'm glad you're still among the living! Thanks for the tip...
Klondike, I've never seen one, Well maybe you will hear of something later...
What is bothering you, my friend?

I think it's time I got out of the Zone... Every day things get worse and worse. Every mutant is more dangerous and vicious, the weather is crappy, there's anomalies you can't see, and people who'll just kill you on sight...
You need a drink! Lets wash those bad thoughts away with vodka...
That will certainly help. Do you have any?
Of course I do... Only the best...
Shit! I know I had a bottle! It's been stolen!
Eh-r-r-m, that is good, you certainly do have the best vodka!
You've been around here for a while. What got you so spooked?

It's a long story... I hope you're not in a hurry?. I used to go on deep raids all the time with a Stalker named Serioga Bezuhim... Sometimes we would venture onto the Radar territory where we would see phantoms and other strange sights...\nSerioga was always someone I could count on to cover my back... He was tough veteran of Chechan war, where he lost an ear. On our last raid together, we ran into a Pseudo-giant. I tried to warn him, but Serioga was already too close to the beast... The Pseudogiant slammed its feet into the ground and knocked Serioga to the ground... And it in consciousness was... The beast closed in on him, and by the time he had stood up. It rammed him right into Fruit Punch anomaly... He melted in agony, right in front of my eyes. I threw down my backpack and ran for my life... I will not go back for it, I do not want it... If you find it, remember Serioga...
I can't talk about it... The Zone has nearly broken me... I'm getting out of here in a couple of days...
I will remember him...
Maybe you will want to talk later...
Hi, can we talk?
I hope you're not trying to sell me something...
I'm not a trader... I just don't like to drink alone...
Well, that's more like it! I will drink with you...
Let's drink to our acquaintance...
Damn, I thought I still had some...
To our acquaintance... Christ! That is some strong vodka!
Yes, not that Smirnoff piss! Hey, what's the word in the Zone?

Well, there is lots of talk... Like there are rich hiding places, hoards of loot Bandits have collected from their victims... There are secret caches of every clan, but I've never met anyone who found them... I did manage to find a PDA which contains the location of a hiding place, and I can share it with you... Very likely I'll not go that far...
Come in the evening to the Bar, we will gather, we will talk... It's possible to hear a lot of useful information, only do not forget to bring vodka...
Thanks, I will be in that area - I will check it out...
Alright, I will see you later...
Hello, old timer. How are you?
Who the hell are you calling old?
I'm sorry. I didn't mean to offend you. May I offer you a drink?
Now you're talking! No offence taken...
Here's to a long life! Spit on all our enemies!
I should leave now...
I'll drink to that... With vodka we can forget everything...
Good vodka, not that watered down piss the bartender sells... Have any information to share?

I do have one piece of information... I was going to check on it with a friend, 'cos I like to have someone watching my back... But he's fallen sick with an infection, and I won't go alone. You're a good person, maybe you want to try finding it? Here's the hiding place...
So many people putting on fronts here, it's impossible to trust anyone... I don't want to talk any more...
I'll come back another time. I will try to restore your belief in people...
No, you're up to something. I'm leaving...
Greetings, brother. Haven't we met before somewhere?
I don't remember meeting you...what's your name?
They call me Marked One...
Nice to meet you Marked One. We should drink to celebrate our meeting. Do you have anything?
Yes, a drink to our new friendship! Here you are! So strong, it could floor a monk...
Sorry, I had to trade all my vodka for ammo...
Ha! You were not joking! It is strong! Well, my new brother, it's always good to meet generous people in the Zone...
Since we are on such good terms now - is it possible to find any loot nearby? Have you heard anything?

I recently went to Yantar, to have a look around... I did not get to far, before my brain started to feel the effects... I saw there these poor fellows - stalkers who are now zombies! How is it possible? How does their brain still function? I found one laying on the ground barely clinging to life. I searched has jacket and got poisoned, it took awhile for me to recover... In his jacket, I found a map with a mark about a cache... But I won't risk going to find it, I will share that info with you...
All loot which was in easy places, has already been found... If you want loot, then make your way to the Zone's center. They say it's full of rare artefacts...
Thanks for the info, I don't mind taking the risk!...
Lots of rare artefacts, you say? Well, well...
Why the long face, my friend?

I think it's time I left the Zone... Every day things get worse and worse. The mutants are more dangerous than ever, the weather's shit, there's anomalies you can't see, and worst of all are the people who'll kill you just for what's in your pockets...
What you need is a stiff drink! then you can relax...
That does sound good. Do you have any?
Of course! I always have vodka!
What the hell! I know I had a bottle! Some bastard must have stolen it!...
Ahhh, that's better. I feel more relaxed already...
Do you have any interesting stories to tell?

It's a long story... I hope you're not in a hurry? I used to go on deep raids all the time with a Stalker named Serioga Bezuhim... Sometimes we would venture onto Radar territory where we would see phantoms and other strange sights...\nSerioga was always someone I could count on to cover my back... He was veteran of the Chechan war, where he lost an ear. On our last raid together, we ran into a Pseudo-giant. I tried to warn him, but Serioga was already too close to the beast... The Pseudogiant slammed its foot down and knocked Serioga to the ground... He almost lost consciousness... The beast closed in on him, and by the time he had stood up it had rammed him right into a Fruit Punch anomaly... He couldn't get up. He just dissolved, in agony, right in front of my eyes. I threw down my backpack and ran... I'll not go back for it... I don't want it... If you find it, please think of Serioga...
I cannot... The Zone has broken me... In a few days, I will get out of here...
I promise to remember him...
The outside world provides even more senseless ways to die...
Hello, brother. How are you?
I couldn't be better... Recently some of us got some R 'n' R, three days outside the Zone... It's a shame that it had to come to an end...
Yes, we all need a break from the Zone sometimes... Can we talk?
You want to ask a question? Over a drink, then. Do you have a bottle?
Yes, I even have the good stuff!
I don't have anything. Another time perhaps...
Ugh, not as good as what I used to have outside the zone. But you can't be picky here...

Have you heard about a Stalker bragging in the Bar? Says he found the cache location of a high ranking mercenary and planned to clean it out. He was so pleased with himself, and even said he found the information on a PDA here at the Warehouses... Next day he was gone, and nobody has seen him since. Maybe you have heard something about him finding the stash?...

I think I know who you're talking about... We were observing the Duty base when an emission suddenly hit... As I was running for shelter, I tripped over a corpse. In his hands was a PDA, so I grabbed it and continued running... When I reached shelter, I investigated this PDA and found a mark on the map. I don't have time to check it out, but you can have the information...
Yes, to hell with it. Nefig was to show off, and may be longer lived. Che me something to dream pulled... Come again! Let's chat about this and that...
Thanks, I will check up on this...
I will come back later. Maybe you will hear something about this incident...
Comrade Max! How is life treating you?
We need to increase our numbers. Can you join our ranks? It will make your life here easy...
Well, I need time to think about it... What do you guys do around here for fun?
We have a good group of guys here, always friendly conversation, and always people ready to share their food and drink...
Now that you mention drinking, I present you with a Ukrainian treat... 'Cossacks' vodka. Have a big drink!
I don't have any vodka to share, I'll have to get more...
Brrr... My liver will appreciate some good spirits for a change!
Well, Max. Tell me what's going on around here. Any information to share?

Recently, Lukash sent me to the Barrier... He said there was trouble coming... Well, I took all these monkeys who just sit by the fire all day...When we got to the Barrier, it was under a mass attack by zombies! At least fifty. We wiped them all out, except for one.... When I approached it, I noticed it was mumbling the same numbers over and over. I put the poor creature out of its misery. When we got back to the base, I checked the numbers on a map and they were coordinates. But I can't tell you what is located there. You can take a look for yourself if you want...
There's plenty going on all the time. But I've got nothing valuable to share at the moment. Come back another time...
Yes, putting these zombies out of their misery is a good deed! I'll check up on the coordinates
Well, I will see you later
Hello, comrade! Could we have a talk?
Good to see you, Marked One! You are always welcome here!
Thanks for the hospitality. Would you like to share a bottle and maybe a little information?
I never turn down a drink! If I can help you, I will
A good drink leads to good conversation! Cheers!
Where have I put it?... I can't find my bottle. I'll have to return another time...
A good drink makes everything better!
Yes! The more the better! I've been looking around for some loot, do you know of any?
Listen, the Cook was drunk the other day. Yeah, no surprise...and he was blabbing about a place he keeps some swag. Would you like the info?
If I had any information I would share, but there's nothing today. Come back another day and we will drink and I might have something for you...
Yes, the Cook is probably the vodka drinking champion of the entire Zone! Well, we will see what he stashed...
Certainly, I will come again. I hope you keep your ears open!
Greetings! What's wrong? What has made you upset?
Greetings, Marked One. Life is shit at the moment. I've got no artefacts, there are no women here, and I'm totally out of vodka...
Well, at least I can help with the vodka... I have a full bottle...
What are you waiting for? Open your backpack! I have the drinking glasses...
Where have I put it? Ah, here it is - at the bottom! We will drink to both women and for finding the most rare of artefacts!
Where... Where did I put it? I will have to fetch another bottle, then we can drink...
I really needed this... It's a shame these glasses are so small. Well let's drink to strong women!
We drink!... Ah, that's good! Do you know about any loot?

I was recently sent with a group to reconnoiter a pass from the Dark Valley to the Army Warehouses. It's not a straightforward job... Duty controls the Bar, and the Monolith and mutants threaten the Barrier. We're in the Dark Valley when we see this sign: 'DANGER - Do Not Proceed'. We got used to ignoring things like this, but twenty metres on we see four bloodsuckers!!! They had a Bandit up a tree and were unaware of our approach, so we focused our fire on the bloodsuckers, and they never knew what hit them. The Bandit came down from the tree with shit running down his jeans. We let the smelly little fucker go - he'd had enough - but we kept his PDA. Inside was a mark on the map. You can have the information, my friend...
I constantly hear these stories, but nothing worth sharing...
That's quite a story! I'll check out this information...
Well then, I need a rest anyway...
Greetings, comrades!
Hey, don't shout - the Zone can get angry... It always reacts violently to disrespect. Now, be calm...sit down. What is it you wanted?
I thought I'd come here and share a drink with my comrades...
Well, that's better, because we don't have any vodka. Be a friend and pour me a full glass...
Here, it's the good stuff...
Well, comrades, I thought I had a bottle... I will have to go and find one at the base...

Thank you, I really needed a drink... We are waiting here for our men to return. They have gone to the village to clear out a den of bloodsuckers. They have been gone too long... I think the worst may have happened...
The breathing sound of a bloodsucker always makes my hair stand on end. Even vodka does not help... Whats going on in this village?

There have been many stories, or legends you might say... Before the emission of 2006, this village was similar to the rookie village at the Cordon. Everyone lived here quietly and peacefully. Then suddenly... an emission erupted with such force that everyone not under shelter had no possible chance of survival... Shouts and screams... Waves of mutants came from the barrier, one after another... The emission lasted maybe ten, fifteen minutes, but it seemed more like three hours. We lost many friends. My own brother was killed here... The next day we came to find the corpses, to take them away and and bury them... I found my brother, lying in a cellar. It was a pitiful sight... I took his weapon and his PDA, and found a unique mark on his PDA map. Here... He left me a hastily scribbled message too, but that's personal...
A lot of misfortune has occurred here... You can see all the dangers of the Zone. Bloodsuckers, burers, controllers, dogs, and even chimeras thrive in this territory...
Yes, I believe that a lot more misfortune is still to come, I'll check out this info, though...
Thanks for the council. I hope we'll meet again...
Hello comrade. Is this your dinner time?
Yes, why do you ask?
Do you have anything to drink?
Unfortunately, no... I don't have anything...
Well, would you like some? What would we do without each other? I have already cracked open the bottle... Here, take a glass! What shall we drink to?
It's a pity, I don't have anything...
We will drink to such people as yourself who share good spirits! Pour a full glass! I want the full effect!
That's strong... Christ, it burns going down! Have you heard of any hidden loot stashed?

Well, Stalker, you have probably travelled all over all Zone... have you not? Do you know about the Dead City? The Mercenaries had a base there. I was taken prisoner by them about a year ago. I was taken there, but first they put a bag over my head and then hit it with a rifle butt to make sure I wouldn't know where they were taking me... When we arrived, they started to interrogate me. Well, I wouldnt give up any information... so they put me in a cage for the night. There were two other prisoners also in the cage. One was actually very similar to you. They both couldn't remember how they'd got to the territory. I noticed our captors looking at a map with certain points marked. I can still remember it clearly... In the morning, they dragged me out and bashed my skull with a rifle butt again. When I regained consciousness, I could tell we were in a car, but I had a hood on my head. We came to a stop and they dragged me out. They told me that I had one last chance to talk. Then, as luck would have it, an emission suddenly erupted... In the confusion, I made a run for it! I fell into a bog, and desperately tried to remove my hood. When I did, I found that I was in the middle of a stinking bog, but next to a carriage, so I climbed into it and waited out the emission. When I came out, I realized they had brought me to Agroprom... When I got back here, I told everyone my story, but nobody believed me...
I've only been here a week. Come back later, I'll see if I can find out something...
That's a hell of a story! It's a miracle that you're alive. We all need luck like that in the Zone...
I will come back later. Maybe you will have some information...
What's wrong?
I've got the chills... I'm shaking all over...
Some hot soup or a bottle of vodka would cure that!
Some vodka would certainly do the trick...
Well, I can help with that! Would you like to share my bottle?
It looks like I'm out at the moment...
Ahhh, that's the good stuff, I feel better already. Thank you friend!
You're very welcome. Listen... have you heard anything about a hidden cache?

Well, I do know of one. But, there's a problem... It's located behind the Barrier. That's a dangerous place. I was doing some recon in the area of those big stones outside the Barrier. I was moving carefully around a boulder when I came face to face with an old comrade - who'd been dead for over a month! He'd become a zombie, so I had to put him down - it's always the right thing to do... In his backpack I found a PDA with a pair of caches marked on it. I cleaned one out, but I've no time to go search for the other one. You can have it...
Well, I heard that at the Agroprom, one can find a mountain of artefacts, but I think they're all gone. If I learn of anything else, I'll keep you in mind...
There's no dignity in ending your life life as a zombie. It's a fate nobody wants... Thanks for the info
Well, I'll check back with you later...
